item.title: CVE-2022-23474|2024-08-03T03:43:46.063Z -- codex-team -- editor.js
item.description: Editor.js is a block-style editor with clean JSON output. Versions prior to 2.26.0 are vulnerable to Code Injection via pasted input. The processHTML method passes pasted input into wrapperâ€™s innerHTML. This issue is patched in version 2.26.0.
